Posts.Content: I had my eye taken out in sep for melanoma,test's showed lung and lyph node cancer,I went threw half of the treatment then quit,I couldn't handle the pain it caused me,I told my doc's I was ready to kiss the sky;a mamagramm was ordered now they want to do a biopsy on my breast's,I feel enough is enough,how much can a person take.
Posts.Title: Too Much
